    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerSynchronizer

        ServerSynchronizer(java.io.ObjectInputStream in,
                   java.io.ObjectOutputStream out,
                   java.lang.String[] PATHS,
                   java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService threads,
                   java.lang.String userName,
                   java.net.Socket socket,
                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> availableUsers)
        Parameters:
        in - input stream for server
        out - output stream for server
        PATHS - server folders
        threads - thread pool
        userName - username of client this synchronizer is run for
        socket - Socket connecting client and server
        availableUsers - list of available users

    • Method Detail

      • synchronizer

        void synchronizer()
        This function with ClientSynchronizer keeps both local and server folders up to date to each other. Data is exchanged in such order: - Server sends list of available users - Client sends list of their files - Server sends list of files missing on server - Client sends one file missing on server or sends file to another user - Server saves file to proper user folders - Server sends one file missing on client
